Name: Neon Tower Blast
About the game: 90-s styled retro FPS! Take your blaster and shoot out some angry robots in the Neon Tower! You play as a military cyborg, who was sent to eliminate all the angry robots in some kind of a neon tower. Get ready for a 7 levels with tons of angry metal!
